header.name: chaos/preprocessor/detection/is_binary.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro used to detect binary parenthetic expressions.

macro.abstract: The macro detects whether its argument begins with a binary parenthetic expression.
macro.para: If x or __VA_ARGS__ begins with a binary parenthetic expression, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
The expression to be tested must begin with a binary parenthetic expression or a non-parenthetic expression. A parenthetic expression of any other arity is invalid input.
